meanings.definition: Absorbing all one's attention or interest.
meanings.sent1: The engrossing book kept me up all night reading.
meanings.sent2: The movie was so engrossing that I forgot to eat dinner.
meanings.sent3: The engrossing puzzle made me lose track of time.
meanings.sent4: Her engrossing storytelling painted vivid pictures in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The engrossing sunset filled the sky with breathtaking colors.

meanings.sent1: The new video game engrossed him for hours.
meanings.sent2: The task of organizing the event engrossed her attention.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so engrossing that no one noticed the time passing.
meanings.sent4: The music engrossed the audience, transporting them to another world.
meanings.sent5: The painting engrossed the viewers with its intricate details.
